title: Medieval Traditional Music
description: 10 main themes, each beautifully crafted with unique variations, offering over 30 minutes and a total of 24 authentic medieval soundtracks.
longDescription:
Embark on an epic journey through medieval realms with my latest Game Music Pack: Medieval Traditional Music. Immerse yourself in the spirit of knights, castles, and lively festivities with this captivating collection. Elevate your game's atmosphere with an unforgettable medieval soundscape that adds joy and excitement to every quest!


Discover 10 main themes, each beautifully crafted with unique variations. These loopable instrumental tracks are available in high-quality (16-bit, 44.1kHz WAV files), offering over 30 minutes and a total of 24 authentic medieval soundtracks.


Ideal for enhancing the immersive experience of your game, whether it's set in bustling villages, majestic castles, or adventurous quests. Bring your medieval fantasy world to life with music that resonates with every player.


Preview: https://youtu.be/t-dmZB58Dl8?si=6ivd9WMhmw5tyZpO

https://on.soundcloud.com/DXpMqWFe8R7a4B1XA

technicalDetails:
Features:


  • 10 main themes original loopable tracks
  • 14 variations of original loopable tracks
  • 30 + minutes of music
  • 24 YouTube Safe Tracks

Number of Audio Wavs: 24

Number of Audio Cues: 24

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30:58 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
